title: Environmental Health Series: Radiological Health
additional-notes: This is a monographic series.  Before concluding an issue is in the public domain, search for book renewals for the issue under its distinctive title. We have not systematically searched individual issue titles.

Spot-checks of issues of this US government publication did not turn up copyright notices.  The reports in the issues were often written by researchers who were not government employees, but who had received government grants.
acknowledgement: Thanks to Pete Sullivan for copyright research on this title.
